clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For use in the treatment of pulmonary and extrapulmonary tuberculosis when other antitubercular drugs have failed

contraindications.disease: Symptoms of overdose include convulsions nausea and vomiting
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Ethinamate is bacteriostatic against i M tuberculosis i In a study examining ethionamide resistance ethionamide administered orally initially decreased the number of culturable i Mycobacterium tuberculosis i organisms from the lungs of H37Rv infected mice Drug resistance developed with continued ethionamide monotherapy but did not occur when mice received ethionamide in combination with streptomycin or isoniazid

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Ethionamide is combined with Cycloserine
The serum concentration of Isoniazid can be increased when it is combined with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Picosulfuric acid can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Ethanol is combined with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of BCG vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Typhoid vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Ethionamide is combined with Dicoumarol
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Ethionamide is combined with Phenindione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Ethionamide is combined with Warfarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Ethionamide is combined with Phenprocoumon
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Ethionamide is combined with Acenocoumarol
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Ethionamide is combined with 4 hydroxycoumarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Ethionamide is combined with Coumarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Ethionamide is combined with R warfarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Ethionamide is combined with Ethyl biscoumacetate
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Ethionamide is combined with Fluindione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Ethionamide is combined with Clorindione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Ethionamide is combined with Diphenadione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Ethionamide is combined with Tioclomarol
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Ethionamide is combined with S Warfarin
The therapeutic efficacy of Lactulose can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Salmon calcitonin can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Thyrotropin alfa can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Follitropin can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide

The therapeutic efficacy of Carbimazole can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide

The therapeutic efficacy of Methimazole can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Liotrix can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of 3 5 Diiodotyrosine can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Tiratricol can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Abaloparatide can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Parathyroid hormone can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Teriparatide can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Potassium Iodide can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Dibromotyrosine can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Thyroid porcine can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Potassium perchlorate can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Protirelin can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of 3 5 diiodothyropropionic acid can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Methylthiouracil can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Elcatonin can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Benzylthiouracil can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The therapeutic efficacy of Thyrotropin can be decreased when used in combination with Ethionamide
The serum concentration of Magnesium can be decreased when it is combined with Ethionamide
